Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Bola (+12 1d6+3 B R20'; dexterity; expert); Light Mace (+12 1d4+3 B; strength; expert); Main-gauche (+12 1d4+3 P/S; strength; expert)

Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage

Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Magic
Spell Slots: D1: 2; D4: 2; D7: 1; DC1: 2 Attack: Divine: +13 (wisdom; master) Spell DC: Divine: 23 (wisdom; master)
Magic Notes:
Basic Cleric Spellcasting: Knows 1 1st-rank divine spell
Cleric Dedication: Spell Trained (Divine)/Can prepare 2 divine cantrips each day
Divine Breadth: Has additional archetype spell slots
Expert Cleric Spellcasting: Spell Expert (Divine)/Knows 1 4th-rank divine spell
Master Cleric Spellcasting: Spell Master (Divine)/Knows 1 7th-rank divine spell
Cleric Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Notes
Validation Errors:
Advanced Dogma Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and basic dogma feature (currently 1)
Class Feats Allocation: 5 available vs. 7 allocated
Divine Breadth Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 8 and basic cleric spellcasting feature (currently 1)
Expert Cleric Spellcasting Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 12, basic cleric spellcasting feature (currently 1) and religion rank (currently 4) >= 3
Master Cleric Spellcasting Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 18, expert cleric spellcasting feature (currently 1) and religion rank (currently 4) >= 4
